price: "Yã Ubangijinmu! Kada Ka sanya mu fitina ga waɗanda suka kãfirta, kuma Ka yi gãfara gare Mu. Ya Ubangijinmu! Kai ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima!
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lilladhīna kafarū wa-igh'fir lanā rabbanā innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
